title: Adding Tags
intro: Tags can be attached to Step allow post-indexation or retrieval of the data attached to those Steps after runtime. This can be especially useful for post-processing of Job data to extract targeted data.

blocks.content: In the Template Editor, go ahead and open a new side panel from the top right hand corner.

blocks.caption: Once open, the Tag editor allows a user to add simple text based tags. The user has the ability to add multiple tags also. To remove a Tag click the cross.

blocks.content: The Tag Edit panel button may not show in the toggle buttons at the top of the side panel. Click the 'More' to see the Tag icon to access the Tag side panel.
